title: Darius and the Dragon's Stone
description: Destiny looms in the balance as a boy is pitted against true evil. All would be lost except for the unexpected help of a noble dragon. Darius and the Dragon's Stone is juvenile fantasy that shines in the make-believe realm of Brandor. The precious book of Brandor is stolen, and now the fate of not just the town but of a destined hero will be tested beyond compare. Outcast and alone, a boy named Darius is Brandor's only hope. Without him and the sacred book, the town will disappear. But Darius has much to learn, and with the help of an extraordinary dragon, he sets out on the adventure of a lifetime. But he soon discovers that as he fights to save Brandor, he must also piece together his own mysterious past. Can he survive the ultimate test? With his dragon, can Darius triumph in the ultimate battle and face the evil sorcerer who stole the book and killed his father?
author: D.L. Torrent
